Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 28th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1981...
Injured on 5/28/1981 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Traded from Cincinnati to Los Angeles on 2/10/1985 (Going to LA: P J. Wetteland, P T. Crews, C T. Munson, P S. Rogers. Going to CIN: 3B J. Mumphrey, DH K. Moreland, LF B. Downing)...
Earned first career win on 5/25/1986...
Injured on 7/13/1992 with a Strained Bicep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Was selected to the 1994 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/1/1995 to a 2-year deal worth $3,500,000 per year...
